message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be extremely valuable to your business.  While I can't disclose the details publicly, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to the right buyer.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,250,000. This represents a significant savings for you, and allows me to secure a fair price.  Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
